FuncDef: This command is used in LSN44 multi-chassis redundancy in conjunction with filters. The configured peer address is an IPv4 address that is configured under an interface on the peering LSN44 node (active or standby). This IPv4 interface address is advertised via routing on the inside in order to attract traffic from the standby to the active LSN44 node.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the NAT redundancy peer. Values-ipv4-address:	a.b.c.d.
